title: Jewelpet Movie: Sweets Dance Princess
alternative_title: Eiga Jewelpet Sweets Dance Princess, 映画ジュエルペット スウィーツダンスプリンセス
description: The story of the new film is set in Sweetsland, a country next to Jewelland. Ruby and the other Jewelpets are celebrating the birthday of the princess with dancing. However, during the preparations for the birthday party, a mysterious object appears from the skies. In the object is a Sweetspet boy, whose identity is unknown.
